item.title: Althar
item.description: Althar fucked LauzonLauzon. He also conquered PytaxPytax and became the father of magic. Casting a spell so powerful (The ShrinkifyingShrinkifying) that many creatures were shrunk and formed completely new (smaller) races.

item.title: Aragi
item.description: Dragonborn leader of the Stormwind ClanStormwind Clan. Huge asshole, and really hates the halfling leader Mr NairoMr Nairo. Lives in a large wooden baracks within Candle StoneCandle Stone.

item.title: Captain Amara
item.description: 3 years ago, One of Myrrdin’sMyrrdin’s closest friends TherapyddTherapydd, set off on his own A’lawdrinaiethA’lawdrinaieth leaving off of The Forlorn ShiverThe Forlorn Shiver never to be seen again.

item.title: Condripitus Wex
item.description: A first generation Gnome and member of the Quill SocietyQuill Society. Sent the PartyParty on a task to some ruins to the north of RiftonRifton to recover some ancient draconic artifacts from the First AgeFirst Age.

item.title: Crouchfield
item.description: Member of the Light CrusadeLight Crusade and one of the leaders of the military attempting to free GrameraiGramerai from the undead caused by the Grave WinterGrave Winter.

item.title: Diadara
item.description: Diadara was a powerful mage and founding member of the Quill SocietyQuill Society and the Arcane AcademyArcane Academy. She was first mentioned by Condripitus WexCondripitus Wex.

item.title: Fellkirk Skryne
item.description: Related to Captain SkryneCaptain Skryne. Located in the Lower GreenLower Green.

item.title: Mr Nairo
item.description: Kobold Chief Counsellor. Has Major beef with AragiAragi, leader of the Stormwind ClanStormwind Clan.

item.title: Myrrdin Chosaach
item.description: Appearance Appearance: Myrrdin Chosach is a 19yr old humanoid male with sky blue skin. Soft patches of white undulate around his exterior almost giving the illusion of clouds rolling across his person.

item.title: Nikephoros
item.description: Nikephoros is a high ranking member in the NoswaithNoswaith society and is one of few YmarferyddYmarferydd on the isle of The Forlorn ShiverThe Forlorn Shiver.

item.title: Party
item.description: %% Begin Waypoint %% LawryLawry Myrrdin ChosaachMyrrdin Chosaach PyrePyre SneapSneap TyphoonTyphoon %% End Waypoint %%

item.title: Pyre
item.description: The leader of the Blackblade TribeBlackblade Tribe, and close with his servant SneapSneap.

item.title: Sneap
item.description: A loyal member of the Blackblade TribeBlackblade Tribe and devout follower of his king, PyrePyre.

item.title: Therapydd
item.description: Therapydd was one of Myrrdin Chosaach’sMyrrdin Chosaach’s life long friends from a young age. MyrrdinMyrrdin and TherapyddTherapydd (His friend that disappeared 3 years ago on his A’lawdrinaiethA’lawdrinaieth) were close friends for all though their childhood.

item.title: Victor Molgo
item.description: Envoy from the Human KingdomHuman Kingdom.
